TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Lanngdun, title = Lanngdun, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lanngdun} }

S.FORM: Lanngdun Itiniay i Xinyi Cen no Nantou ko Lanngdun a niyaro', 312 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,219 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 1,156 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 63 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun91 , Tayal2 , Amis1 . Ira ko picodadan( , ) i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
